title: Blazing Transfer Students
overview: Seven transfer students appear at the mysterious elite school, Tanebi Gakuen, established by Takizawa Noboru, who was once called the "Blazing Transfer Student." Coincidentally, all seven students have the first name Kakeru. The Kakerus sneak into this problematic school with the secret mission of improving it from the inside. This drama stars the 7-member idol group Johnny's WEST.
